commands.description: This command will list all available commands in the chat bot.

bot.description: This command will display information about who the developer is and a website link.

roadmap.description: This command will give a link in chat to the public Trello board.

quote.description: This command will retrieve a random or specific quote for inspiration.

rps.description: This command will let you play Rock-Paper-Scissors with Specter.

story.description: This command will start a collaborative AI storytelling message.

roulette.description: This command will kick off a playful game of roulette in chat.

songrequest.description: This command will allow users to request songs for my Spotify queue (if your account is linked).

songqueue.description: This command will show the current Spotify song request queue (if your account is linked).

skipsong.description: This command allows users to skip the currently playing song in the queue.

watchtime.description: This command will reveal how long you have been watching the stream.

stoptimer.description: This command will stop a currently running timer.

checktimer.description: This command will show the remaining time on an active timer.

version.description: This command will display Specter's current running version.

convert.description: This command will convert currencies or units as requested.

subathon.description: This command will manage subathon events and countdown timers.

todo.description: This command will handle the to-do list for stream tasks.

kill.description: This command will simulate a fun 'kill' action for interactions.

points.description: This command will show the current points balance of a user.

slots.description: This command will run a slot machine game for chat fun.

timer.description: This command will start a new countdown timer.

game.description: This command will show the currently active game or status.

gamble.description: This command will allow users to gamble their points for a chance to win more.

joke.description: This command will tell a random joke for some laughs.

ping.description: This command will check Specter's responsiveness to the internet.

weather.description: This command will provide weather info for a specified location.

time.description: This command will display the current time in a given timezone.

song.description: This command will show details about the currently playing song: either via Spotify (if linked) or via Shazam (if you're a premium user).

translate.description: This command will translate text into a specified language.

cheerleader.description: This command will show the top user that has cheered the most in my channel.

steam.description: This command will display information about the current playing game if it's on Steam.

schedule.description: This command will show the stream's schedule and upcoming events.

mybits.description: This command will display a user's bits statistics.

lurk.description: This command will mark you as lurking.

unlurk.description: This command will remove your lurking status.

lurking.description: This command will notify that you are currently lurking.

lurklead.description: This command will show the top most lurked user in your channel.

userslurking.description: This command will show a count of users that are currently marked as lurking.

clip.description: This command will create a clip of the current stream action.

subscription.description: This command will display what subscription tier you are at.

hug.description: This command will send a virtual hug to a mentioned user.

highfive.description: This command will give a virtual high-five to a mentioned user.

kiss.description: This command will send a playful virtual kiss to a mentioned user.

uptime.description: This command will display how long the stream has been live.

typo.description: This command will count how many typing errors a mentioned user has done.

typos.description: This command will show a count of the number chat typos a mentioned user has made.

followage.description: This command will show how long you have followed the channel.

deaths.description: This command will display how many times you've died in-game.

heartrate.description: This command will show your heart rate in chat. (if you have setup the hyperate code in your profile.)

addcommand.description: This command will add a new custom command to the system.

removecommand.description: This command will remove an existing custom command.

editcommand.description: This command will edit an existing custom command.

removetypos.description: This command will remove a type from a mentioned user.

addpoints.description: This command will award points to a mentioned user.

removepoints.description: This command will deduct points from a mentioned user.

permit.description: This command will grant permission for special actions or commands.

removequote.description: This command will delete a quote from the quote system.

quoteadd.description: This command will add a new quote to the quote system.

settitle.description: This command will update the stream's title.

setgame.description: This command will update the stream's game category.

edittypos.description: This command will edit the recorded typos for the mentioned user.

deathadd.description: This command will increase the death count when you die in-game.

deathremove.description: This command will decrease the death count to correct errors.

shoutout.description: This command will give a shoutout to a notable user.

marker.description: This command will set a marker in the stream for highlights.

checkupdate.description: This command will check if Specter has a new update available.

startlotto.description: This command will initiate a lottery among chat participants.

drawlotto.description: This command will draw and announce the lottery winner(s).

wsstatus.description: This command will check and display the WebSocket server connection status for the channel instance.

dbstatus.description: This command will check and display the database connection status, including connection uptime or last connection attempt time.

obs.description: This command is used to interact with the OBS Connector app for BotOfTheSpecter.

createraffle.description: This command will create a new raffle with specified name, prize, and number of winners. The raffle will be scheduled and must be started with !startraffle.

startraffle.description: This command will start a scheduled raffle. Use without arguments to start the first scheduled raffle, or provide a raffle ID to start a specific one (e.g., !startraffle 4).

joinraffle.description: This command allows viewers to join an active raffle.

leaveraffle.description: This command allows viewers to leave an active raffle they have joined.

stopraffle.description: This command will stop and end an active raffle without drawing winners.

drawraffle.description: This command will draw and announce the raffle winner(s) according to the configured number of winners.
